basics.name: Vasyl Liutikov
basics.label: Senior iOS Developer at Mädchenflohmarkt GmbH
basics.summary: I'm a problems solver. I was involved in last 3 projects as an expert who can solve their tech debt.  Strong knowledge: Objective-C 2.0 (Cocoa, Cocoa Touch) and Swift 3.1+ 8+ years of experience with iOS 11+ years of software engineering experience  Experience in mobile development (iOS)  Some experience in Mac OS X development Experience in DevOps (CI, writing mobile build system) Experience of work with next IDE: XCode, AppCode  Specialties: Design and development of mobile software.  Upper-Intermediate English, IELTS 6.0

work.summary: Returned app to life after 2 years background support from outsourcing team.
highlights: Removed deprecated API and updated to modern Obj-C. Was fixed 249 warnings.
Reduced build time by 40%.
Increased app rating from 3.2 to 4.6 in the German Apple App Store.
Started a huge work with rewriting the app to modern UI/UX.
Was paid the solid part of tech debt.
And many more nice changes about that I can't say...
